titles.title: Earl N. Williams, Sr., First Chance Act
Earl N. Williams, Sr., First Chance Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide basic and emergency supplemental living assistance grants under the student support services program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Earl N. Williams, Sr., First Chance Act
This bill expands the TRIO Student Support Services Program to include grants to students at institutions of higher education for basic and emergency supplemental living assistance.
